tool_description: Monitor Tron Mainnet and Tron Shasta network contract events and get prompt and reliable webhook calls with event details
name: Contract Event Monitor
title: Contract Event Monitor

api_list.name: Create contract address to monitor
api_list.description:
Create a contract address to monitor.  A webhook in the following format will be sent when a transaction of this address is safely confirmed:
`
{
  "eventId": "2fccbd48-ef4c-4c3d-8ec3-af8eed07e758",
  "network": "TRON_SHASTA",
  "eventMetadata": {
    "event": "Transfer(address indexed from, address indexed to, uint256 value)",
    "result": {
      "0": "0x219e4537174603afc11d46ecd32fcf1ff01dcfcb",
      "1": "0x4fe01281f321955ac479d45a738e980e8a4220e3",
      "2": "100000000",
      "to": "0x4fe01281f321955ac479d45a738e980e8a4220e3",
      "from": "0x219e4537174603afc11d46ecd32fcf1ff01dcfcb",
      "value": "100000000"
    },
    "event_name": "Transfer",
    "event_index": 0,
    "result_type": {
      "to": "address",
      "from": "address",
      "value": "uint256"
    },
    "block_number": 35576742,
    "transaction_id": "7f63b610af7dcc3cad6aeb0f706a357e331a4c3f93b1ecd619ec280def36c5ee",
    "block_timestamp": 1689993762000,
    "contract_address": "TG3XXyExBkPp9nzdajDZsozEu4BkaSJozs",
    "caller_contract_address": "TG3XXyExBkPp9nzdajDZsozEu4BkaSJozs"
  },
  "publicAddress": "tg3xxyexbkpp9nzdajdzsozeu4bkasjozs",
  "contractAddressId": "4cebc3f4-6b73-48a1-9ee6-76770c400f06"
}
`
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://contract-event-monitor.p.rapidapi.com/contract-address"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "contract-event-monitor.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://contract-event-monitor.p.rapidapi.com/contract-address"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "contract-event-monitor.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
